channel.title: I've Created A Valve News Network!
channel.description:
Heres the link to the Youutube channel : [url]https://www.youtube.com/user/valvenewsnetwork[/url] I talk about NECA with Valve and The Portal 2 DLC....
My second video is being uploaded at the time of post, please leave constructive feedback if you can, I need to know what to fix... I will post updates below
Join the Steam Group! [url]https://steamcommunity.com/groups/VNN[/url]

item.title: I've Created A Valve News Network!
item.dc:creator: Dr_Rosenberg
item.description:
Good luck. I tried doing this once for a S.T.A.L.K.E.R. based forum. It ended up that I was spending my spare time on searching the Stalker community for good videos, subscribing to video producers, starting promotional partnerships and nominating videos of the week while nobody else wanted to get involved inot the project.

Read full topic
item.source: I've Created A Valve News Network!

item.title: I've Created A Valve News Network!
item.dc:creator: freundin88
item.description:
I think you’re doing an awesome job with your site. I subscribed and logon regularly

Read full topic
item.source: I've Created A Valve News Network!

item.title: I've Created A Valve News Network!
item.dc:creator: SkyBlue
item.description:
I’m sorry, but seriously? They’re decent enough videos, but Valve news? This might be good for when they drip-feed information in the 2 months leading up to a release, when you can provide a summary of all the new ideas suggested every few days in different forums, but until that sort of time all you can really discuss is which hats are most popular. (most of this isn’t your fault, but it is something you have to allow for)

Read full topic
item.source: I've Created A Valve News Network!

item.title: I've Created A Valve News Network!
item.dc:creator: Hyperbyte
item.description:
tyler21:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=11-o_q-em70&feature=channel_video_title
New Video Up

Good, but a little bit long and some parts are a bit redundant. For example: “Doug Lombardi has stated in an interview that in the future we are going to see more Half-Life … In an interview Lombardi has said ‘You will see more Half-Life’”.

You’re doing a lot of cutting between sentences, which is good, but make sure you don’t repeat information. Or at least not in the exact same wording.

Read full topic
item.source: I've Created A Valve News Network!
